page.title: 15SCHOOL DINNERS
page.content: It costs 6Op a day for a school dinner. We have a cafeteria system, that is you are given a plastic tray and you then collect your own food from the dinner ladies. We eat our dinners in the school hall. Some of the food we eat is nice but most of it is awful. For example, the shredded carrot has bits of brown in it and left over meat from yesterday is used for salad and it is all dried up. The nice things are sausage and bean rounders and apricot dessert. The worst meal of the year is Christmas dinner. Most of the food is cold and soggy. Because the dinners were awful, I brought sandwiches.
